KOTO-SHO/蘭嶼
Koto-Sho / 蘭嶼
1944年二戰後期，美軍為準備登陸台灣島的計畫，特地依據大日本帝國測繪的地形圖配合航照測量技術，製做了一批全台地形圖。(地形誇張化2.5倍)
In 1944, the latter period of WWII, US army was planning to invade Taiwan which was governed by Japan at that time. In order to be well prepared, the US army referred to Imperial Japan's topo maps and took advantage of aerial images to make these amazing maps. Let's see how it looks after I add DEM beneath the map.(Exaggeration: 2.5)
Software/API：ArcGIS Pro, ArcGIS API for JavaScript, ArcGIS Enterprise, Blender
Maker:Wen-Yi Chou
